content.description: Walk up the arete ramp to the right of Ringing in the New Year. Try to do it no handed like Johnny Dawes. youtube.com/watch?v=gB-makVâ€¦
content.location: Weight Loss Program is to the right of Ringing in the New Year.

content.description: Start matched on low crimp, pull feet on and go up and then left. Tops out the same as Resolution.
content.location: Facing the New Year's Boulder from the bottom of the hill, this is the left arete of the side facing you. Or the right arete of the left face. It's to the right of Resolution.

content.description: Crouch start on crimps with high improbable feet. Head up and left to top out.
content.location: This line is in between Cheap Champagne and Weight Loss Program.

content.description: Sit start on pinch and undercling. Follow the shelf right to top out with Times Square. Make sure you bring your whole bag of tricks for this problem!
content.location: Facing the New Year's Boulder from the bottom of the hill, this is on the far corner of the left face.

content.description: Start on crimps with right heel hook. Trend left for the top out. Gets a little spicy up top.
content.location: Facing the boulder from the bottom of the hill, this is in the middle of the right face, directly to the right of the Champagne cave project. Tops out the same as the project.

content.description: Sit start on the sloper arete, follow the arete straight up to top out. Such cool holds as the boulder rounds out up top!
content.location: On the arete directly to the left of Resolution.

content.description: The New Year's Boulder is one of the finest boulders in Central VA. High quality greenstone.
